name: 8SEC SAS
description: Operator of a game studio intended to develop engaging casual games. The company specializes in developing online and mobile games based on the trivia genre that is free to download and play, enabling individuals with an interactive gaming experience.
one_liner: Operator of a game studio intended to develop engaging casual games. The company specializes in developing online and mobile games based on the trivia genre that is free to download and play, enabling individuals with an interactive gaming experience.

name: Appionics Holdings
description: Developer of non-fungible token (NFT) platform and related applications intended to provide digital property rights services to gamers and internet users. The company leverages gamification and blockchain to develop and market a portfolio of mobile applications, games and also additional products orientated to educational learning, ensuring transparency, security and new business models, enabling users to trade and exchange digital property.
one_liner: Developer of non-fungible token (NFT) platform and related applications intended to provide digital property rights services to gamers and internet users. The company leverages gamification and blockchain to develop and market a portfolio of mobile applications, games and also additional products orientated to educational learning, ensuring transparency, security and new business models, enabling users to trade and exchange digital property.

name: Bunch Live, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile game application designed to play favorite games over video chat. The company's application delivers a social gaming experience on smartphones and tablets even when the players are physically apart, enabling video gamers to play with friends with the liberty to laugh together and engage in friendly banter.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile game application designed to play favorite games over video chat. The company's application delivers a social gaming experience on smartphones and tablets even when the players are physically apart, enabling video gamers to play with friends with the liberty to laugh together and engage in friendly banter.

name: CardMonster Inc.
description: Developer of both offline and online casual games, including board games, trading card games, and tabletop games. The company’s core strategy focuses on first creating and refining games in their offline form, such as board games and tabletop games. Once these concepts are well-tested and polished, they are then transitioned to online formats using the company’s proprietary game development platform.
one_liner: Developer of both offline and online casual games, including board games, trading card games, and tabletop games. The company’s core strategy focuses on first creating and refining games in their offline form, such as board games and tabletop games. Once these concepts are well-tested and polished, they are then transitioned to online formats using the company’s proprietary game development platform.

name: Eksab Corporation
description: Operator of a sports entertainment platform intended to offer online fantasy, prediction and trivia games. The company's platform includes making predictions about live football games from around the world, collecting points based on the accuracy of predictions and getting rewarded with prizes, enabling users to challenge their friends with fun, exciting and engaging mobile games.
one_liner: Operator of a sports entertainment platform intended to offer online fantasy, prediction and trivia games. The company's platform includes making predictions about live football games from around the world, collecting points based on the accuracy of predictions and getting rewarded with prizes, enabling users to challenge their friends with fun, exciting and engaging mobile games.

name: ELKROOM CO., LTD.
description: Developer of game launcher designed to optimize the gaming experience. The company offers a game launcher to assist mobile game players so that they can have a better experience playing games on mobile phones and can also record every moment of playing, enabling players to optimize and speed up their phones so they can enjoy playing without any delay.
one_liner: Developer of game launcher designed to optimize the gaming experience. The company offers a game launcher to assist mobile game players so that they can have a better experience playing games on mobile phones and can also record every moment of playing, enabling players to optimize and speed up their phones so they can enjoy playing without any delay.

name: Endless Studios LLC
description: A game creation studio providing apprenticeships for learners to collaborate with professionals in art, design, engineering, and storytelling to develop two-dimensional and three-dimensional video games.
one_liner: A game creation studio providing apprenticeships for learners to collaborate with professionals in art, design, engineering, and storytelling to develop two-dimensional and three-dimensional video games.

name: Esports Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a global media network intended to organize sports tournaments and events. The company's network specializes in creating a platform for entrepreneurs, engineers, gamers, and industry specialists to compete in online and on-ground tournaments, enabling gamers to access and participate in various global e-sports competitions.
one_liner: Operator of a global media network intended to organize sports tournaments and events. The company's network specializes in creating a platform for entrepreneurs, engineers, gamers, and industry specialists to compete in online and on-ground tournaments, enabling gamers to access and participate in various global e-sports competitions.

name: FIVE JACK Co. Ltd
description: Provider of an e-commerce gaming platform intended to make changes for gaming industry in terms of e-commerce. The company's e-commerce gaming platform Itemku, focuses on trading virtual game items in Indonesia, enabling gamers to buy and trade in gaming currency, as a means of strengthening their game characters and to make money.
one_liner: Provider of an e-commerce gaming platform intended to make changes for gaming industry in terms of e-commerce. The company's e-commerce gaming platform Itemku, focuses on trading virtual game items in Indonesia, enabling gamers to buy and trade in gaming currency, as a means of strengthening their game characters and to make money.

name: Funway Esports Ltd.
description: Operator of card game show and competitive tournaments. The company hosts mahjong events throughout Taiwan, enabling players to stay connected through competitive tournaments.
one_liner: Operator of card game show and competitive tournaments. The company hosts mahjong events throughout Taiwan, enabling players to stay connected through competitive tournaments.

name: GXC, Inc.
description: Operator of an acceleration and incubation program intended to support small studios from all over the world with development, publishing, and fundraising. The company's program offers funding, game development and support, global publisher exposure, fundraising assistance, and an extensive global network of professionals to give them the feedback they need to establish their studios and projects, enabling mobile game developers to get financial support for their game development publishing.
one_liner: Operator of an acceleration and incubation program intended to support small studios from all over the world with development, publishing, and fundraising. The company's program offers funding, game development and support, global publisher exposure, fundraising assistance, and an extensive global network of professionals to give them the feedback they need to establish their studios and projects, enabling mobile game developers to get financial support for their game development publishing.

name: Jade Autism LTD
description: Developer of therapeutic validation games designed to help children and adolescents with cognitive disabilities. The company's games offer data science, constant updates, reporting, and behavior analysis, enabling users to stimulate visual performance, attention, receptive language, and mathematical logical reasoning through games.
one_liner: Developer of therapeutic validation games designed to help children and adolescents with cognitive disabilities. The company's games offer data science, constant updates, reporting, and behavior analysis, enabling users to stimulate visual performance, attention, receptive language, and mathematical logical reasoning through games.

name: Buffd Inc.
description: Provider of broadcasting and streaming services intended to discover, watch and engage in various esports events. The company's platform aggregates and indexes every major esports tournament from various esports games into one destination to keep users informed and up to date in esports, enabling esports fans to watch every live streaming and access related data ranging from team/player profiles, brackets, standings and stats in one place.
one_liner: Provider of broadcasting and streaming services intended to discover, watch and engage in various esports events. The company's platform aggregates and indexes every major esports tournament from various esports games into one destination to keep users informed and up to date in esports, enabling esports fans to watch every live streaming and access related data ranging from team/player profiles, brackets, standings and stats in one place.

name: Lootex Holdings Inc.
description: Developer of a cross-chain trading platform intended to liberate game asset ownership and connect blockchain games to traditional players. The company specializes in providing a game-oriented NFT marketplace and fraud-free ecosystem, enabling users to trade and discover the assets in the metaverse and also make virtual assets real by helping digital creators to protect their works.
one_liner: Developer of a cross-chain trading platform intended to liberate game asset ownership and connect blockchain games to traditional players. The company specializes in providing a game-oriented NFT marketplace and fraud-free ecosystem, enabling users to trade and discover the assets in the metaverse and also make virtual assets real by helping digital creators to protect their works.

name: Playbite Inc.
description: Developer of a gaming platform designed to earn tickets while playing. The company's application allows gamers to redeem their earned ticket for prize money, enabling users to play fun games and earn real prizes.
one_liner: Developer of a gaming platform designed to earn tickets while playing. The company's application allows gamers to redeem their earned ticket for prize money, enabling users to play fun games and earn real prizes.

name: Playroom Inc
description: Developer of a multiplayer toolkit platform designed to build multiplayer games in minutes. The company's platform offers a low-code SDK and AI tools, which is a great option for indie developers, game studios, and students who want to create multiplayer games without having to spend a lot of time and money, enabling developers to create games easily.
one_liner: Developer of a multiplayer toolkit platform designed to build multiplayer games in minutes. The company's platform offers a low-code SDK and AI tools, which is a great option for indie developers, game studios, and students who want to create multiplayer games without having to spend a lot of time and money, enabling developers to create games easily.

name: Puzzlium Inc.
description: Developer of a web-based puzzle-solving platform designed for recreational and educational purposes. The company's platform offers a wide variety of puzzles, riddles, and brain teasers, enabling users to engage in challenging and stimulating activities that promote problem-solving skills, critical thinking, and mental agility for individuals of all ages and interests.

The company's platform offers a wide variety of puzzles, riddles, and brain teasers, enabling users to engage in challenging and stimulating activities that promote problem-solving skills, critical thinking, and mental agility for individuals of all ages and interests.

name: Rover Labs Inc.
description: Provider of mobile campaign platform designed to drive mobile engagement and monetization with enhanced mobile campaigns. The company's mobile campaign platform offers to design rich, native experiences in the browser and create a sponsored activation of any event, a mobile campaign experience or even an interactive trivia game, enabling clients to deliver the mobile content to the right audience and the right time.

name: Ryu Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of an online gaming platform designed to facilitate real-money tournaments in online video game matches of skill. The company's platform uses blockchain to store tournament results, handle payments, and encrypt sensitive user data, enabling game developers to quickly craft games the way they want them to.

name: Super Free Games, Inc.
description: Super Lucky

name: Synervoz Communications Inc.
description: Developer of an innovation & software studio intended to focus on audio, entertainment, and online collaboration. The company has designed, developed, and co-created apps, SDKs, and embedded products with complex audio pipelines focused on custom engineering solutions for other companies and source code that can be licensed or purchased outright, enabling clients to have access to applications that are balanced in real-time and offers non-live content that can be synchronized between parties.

industry: AI/Machine Learning, AudioTech, Developer Tools, Gaming, No Code, Telecommunications, Deep Tech, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Entertainment / Media, Consumer, Network Effects

name: Tales, Inc.
description: Developer of a content publishing platform through generative artificial intelligence tools, new storytelling formats, and ownership models, designed to offer budding writers a space to showcase their creative skills. The company's platform lets creators make books, comics, games, audiobooks, and everything in between, enabling content creators to rapidly pilot episodic stories and iterate off feedback or metrics to improve performance.

name: Tamatem, Inc.
description: Developer of localized versions of mobile games designed to serve games tailored to the language and culture of the region. The company's mobile games are published with partners from international studios and developers taking their games and making them culturally relevant for the Arabic gamer, enabling users to optimize and monetize their games.

name: Touchten Games Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of mobile games designed to provide specialized arcade and puzzle-based games on smartphones. The company's games can be downloaded by both Android and iOS users alike and played on any device, enabling mobile game enthusiasts to play games.
one_liner: Developer of mobile games designed to provide specialized arcade and puzzle-based games on smartphones. The company's games can be downloaded by both Android and iOS users alike and played on any device, enabling mobile game enthusiasts to play games.

name: Clickgaming Distribution Group Sdn. Bhd.
description: Manufacturer of gaming chairs and accessories intended to provide long hours of comfort for greater productivity and performance. The company offers ergonomic gaming chairs as well as smart desks, cable organizers, cushions, casters, and many more, enabling gamers to play and enjoy games comfortably.

name: Wombo Gaming Inc.
description: Operator of a training and coaching platform intended to encourage community gaming. The company's platform creates an environment that brings together online players in the same learning environment and fans wanting to increase their in-game performance and compete with their peers, and pro players wanting to monetize their experience and knowledge through coaching, enabling gamers access courses, personalized coaching and other experiences with esports experts and watch and enjoy various sports and games.

The company's platform offers an internet sports discovery network and specializes in trading, buying, and selling in-game virtual assets both on centralized and decentralized platforms, enabling players to connect with teams, sponsors, and other sports enthusiasts and create their professional profiles, as well as compete with each other.

description: Developer of gaming applications and software. The company's applications are developed through its team of experienced software developers and have flexible gaming features that can be modified as per requirements.
one_liner: Developer of gaming applications and software. The company's applications are developed through its team of experienced software developers and have flexible gaming features that can be modified as per requirements.

name: CPM Games S.R.L
description: Operator of a mobile and social games studio intended to develop immersive mobile games. one_liner: Provider of an eSports wagering service. The company provides a platform enabling users to game and put wagers on multiplayer online games such as 'Shadow Daggers,' 'League of Legends,' 'Call of Duty' and 'Starcraft 2.'
